title: Albero Kobe
text:
is a Japanese women's <a href="Association%20football">football</a> team which played <a href="Japan%20Women%27s%20Football%20League">Japan Women's Football League</a>.
History.
Albero Kobe was founded as Aguilas Kobe in 2003. In 2010 season, Aguilas Kobe was promoted <a href="Japan%20Women%27s%20Football%20League">Japan Women's Football League</a>. In 2012 season, the club withdrew league and changed club name to Albero Kobe.
